Posts.Content: Jun 2, 2019 12:39PM edj3 wrote: Good plan--my husband and I put all our questions together in Google Keep on our phones for every consult appointment I've had so far. That way, we kept track of the questions and the answers. It sure helped us a lot. If you're an iPhone user, I'm sure there's an app for you in the Apple ecosystem.
